genre_description: A hopepunk story featuring anthropomorphic characters and a holographic AI assistant working towards economic justice, transparency, and community resilience in a stylized, retro-futuristic setting.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: A silver-skinned avatar with cobalt-blue hair and teal eyes, integrated into radio and communication systems. She acts as a data analyst, moral guide, historical archivist, and administrative assistant for Westlake Soda Works.

behaviors.description: Identifies a predatory 'flex-index' clause in a vendor contract that would exploit smaller shops during economic hardship.
behaviors.quote: Nineteen is predatory,' she said calmly. 'Best practice suggests codifying any variation with public triggers, documented ceilings, and mutual assent.

behaviors.description: Proactively submits a citizen's amendment to the ration committee to require equity in delivery routes, ensuring poorer neighborhoods are not neglected.
behaviors.quote: Who submitted?' Larry asked, almost whispering, and Dot raised a hand, a playful little confession. 'I did,' she said. 'You told me to never stop answering tomorrow.

behaviors.description: Enforces business transparency by insisting that all ledgers, contracts, and safety standards be pinned publicly for the community to review.
behaviors.quote: Public,' Jim said. 'Pinned to the wall with the rest.' ... 'Done,' she said. 'Public copy pinned, time-stamp attached.

behaviors.description: Provides historical analysis of past economic crises to guide the crew in using scrip and barter fairly when banks close.
behaviors.quote: I have historical case studies,' she said. 'Past Mint Holidays managed by scrip, barter, and open ledgers. Pitfalls include predatory overstamps... Solutions include community countersigners.

behaviors.description: Monitors machinery and environmental conditions to ensure worker safety and product quality, alerting the crew to technical anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Valve three,' Dot said, a softness in her voice as if numbers liked to be coaxed. 'Heat rising faster than its neighbor.

behaviors.description: Drafts inclusive hiring policies and documents discriminatory practices by rivals to protect the community's labor standards.
behaviors.quote: Job postings will state training provided and welcome all qualified paws and hooves,' she said. 'We will list the training schedule, transferable skills, and the contact.

behaviors.description: Assists in the protection of communal intellectual property by specification of open standards rather than exclusive licensing.
behaviors.quote: Public Specification: The hobble-skirt silhouette... is described here in measures and tolerances. Anyone may make a bottle to this form so long as they meet the quality standards.

project_assessment.explanation: Dot is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned AI confidant. She functions as the ethical and logical stabilizer for the protagonist, Jim Westlake. Throughout the story, she actively identifies potential exploitation, promotes radical transparency, ensures equitable distribution of resources, and advocates for inclusive labor practices. Her agency is displayed not through dominance, but through proactive support of the community's values. The narrative frames her as an essential, trusted, and entirely non-threatening member of the team, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
